title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4063.2 - Starting claimed horse
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4063.2 - Starting claimed horse

State Regulations

If a horse is claimed, such horse shall not start in a
claiming race for a period of 30 days from the date of claim for less than 25
percent more than the amount for which it was claimed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4063.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
